doc:
Michael V. Gazzo https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Michael_V._Gazzo 0 Michael Vincenzo Gazzo (April 5, 1923 – February 14, 1995) was an American playwright who later in life became a film and television actor. He was nominated for an Academy Award for his role in The Godfather Part II (1974). Michael_Vincenzo_Gazzo ( April_5_,_1923 – February_14_,_1995 ) was an_American_playwright who later in life became a_film_and_television_actor . He was_nominated for an_Academy_Award for his_role in The_Godfather_Part_II_(_1974_) .
